/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and power lines, creating a sense of depth and scale. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the urban landscape. Cars and a truck are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active transportation. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
